text: Bruno Jean Cornil Metsu (28 January 1954 – 15 October 2013) was a French footballer-turned manager. He died of colon cancer. ==Honours as a manager== ===Club=== Al-Ain *UAE Football League: 2002–03, 2003–04 *UAE Super Cup: 2003 *AFC Champions League: 2002–03 Al-Gharafa *Qatar Stars League: 2004–05 *Sheikh Jassem Cup: 2005–06 *Qatar Crown Prince Cup: 2011 *Emir of Qatar Cup runner- up: 2006, 2011 ===International=== Senegal *African Cup of Nations runner-up: 2002 United Arab Emirates *Gulf Cup of Nations: 2007 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Footballers from Nord Category:French football managers
title: Bruno Metsu
